name: Raquel Christobell
bio:
ABOUT US

Christobell Luxury has the best 100% Virgin and Remy Lace Wigs and Hair Extensions.  We are dedicated to providing our clients with Premium Quality Hair for the best price.   Here at Christobell Luxury, we utilize the highest quality human hair, the most innovative, sophisticated manufacturing techniques. We stand by our products and support our client base with great customer communication service.
 
                                             Our goal
 is to insure that the Christobell Luxury brand continues to carry its tradition of integrity, consistency and reliability. 
 
	                        Our Hair
Christobell Luxury hair is among the finest 100% Virgin AAA grade hair available on the in the market. We provide the best quality hair to you by selecting the best raw materials non-damaged un-process, cuticle healthy hair.  Our hair under goes a strict quality control process for every procedure to ensure exceptional great quality. The hair is inspected to ensure all cuticles are left intact and aligned in the same direction virtually eliminating matting and tangling.
Our Extra Virgin hair is 100% natural hair that has not been chemically treated in anyway.
